verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ah, Lord God, Thou hast made the heavens,
And the earth, by Thy great power.
Ah, Lord God, Thou hast made the heavens,
And the earth, by Thine outstretched arm.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nothing is too difficult for Thee.(2x)
Ah, great and mighty God, great in counsel,
And mighty in deed. Nothing! nothing!
Absolutely nothing! Nothing is too difficult for Thee.
